caption.title: Clinical and laboratory characteristics of studied patients.
caption.p: A. Differences in HIV-VL among PWID, the two groups infected with F1 subtype and recombinant forms (CRF14_BG, URFs of CRF14_BG and F1) B. Differences in HCV-VL in mono-infected and HIV co-infected patients (PWID) C. CD4 count distribution in PWID at baseline D. Clinical HIV stages at diagnosis in PWID.
